ConfigurationOption.Value: select wp.itemnum, wp.description, wp.itemsetid, wp.location, i.binnum, wp.conditioncode, wp.itemqty, wo.parent, wp.orderunit, wp.hours, wp.wonum, wp.linetype, wp.requestnum, wp.requiredate, wp.siteid, wp.orgid, i.inventoryid, wo.workorderid, wp.wpitemid from wpitem wp left join inventory i on wp.itemnum = i.itemnum and wp.location = i.location and wp.siteid = i.siteid and wp.orgid = i.orgid left join workorder wo on wp.wonum = wo.wonum and wp.siteid = wo.siteid where wp.linetype in ('ITEM','TOOL')

List.ListEntry: wo.wonum in ( select refwo from lbl_labtrans where lbl_transtype = 'PLAN' and laborcode = '${MX_LABOR_CODE}' ) and wo.status in ( select value from synonymdomain where domainid = 'WOSTATUS' and maxvalue in ('APPR','INPRG') )
